dcterms:creator: Mastane Achab
dcterms:description: A dataset used to learn the cyclic pairwise probabilities in the rock-paper-scissors game, allowing the smooth XOR method to effectively learn the cyclic rankings.
dcterms:title: Rock-Paper-Scissors Dataset

dcterms:creator: Francis Bach
dcterms:description: A dataset used for SoftMin regression, which is defined as the log-loss of a sum of log-concave functions, mimicking the minimum of square losses.
dcterms:title: SoftMin Regression Dataset

dcterms:creator: Gerard Ben Arous
Reza Gheissari
Aukosh Jagannath
dcterms:description: A dataset representing a Gaussian mixture model, which is a sum of log-concave functions, frequently encountered in machine learning.
dcterms:title: Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM)

dcterms:creator: Gerard Ben Arous
Reza Gheissari
Aukosh Jagannath
dcterms:description: A dataset representing the XOR Gaussian mixture model, which is a smooth XOR function arising from mixtures of distributions belonging to some exponential family.
dcterms:title: XOR Gaussian Mixture Model
